ScenarioEntry.name: Attribute Not Valid

ScenarioEntry.name: Attribute Set Not Valid
ScenarioEntry.Description: No finding exists that includes the given set of attribute values. It may be valid attribute if put in as a separate finding Ex: [subepidermal blister, intraepidermal] VS [subepidremal blister] and [inraepidermal blister] concept

ScenarioEntry.name: Attribute Value is Incorrect

ScenarioEntry.name: Attribute is Not Important

ScenarioEntry.name: Incorrect Attribute Location

ScenarioEntry.name: Diagnosis Doesn't Have Enough Evidence
